verses.verse: Contend,<WH7378> Yahweh,<WH3068> with those who contend<WH7378> with me.<WH3898> Fight against those who fight against me.<WH3898>
Take hold<WH2388> of shield<WH4043> and buckler,<WH6793> and stand up<WH6965> for my help.<WH5833>
Brandish<WH7324> the spear<WH2595> and block<WH5462> those<WH7125> who pursue<WH7291> me.<WH559> Tell my soul,<WH5315> "I am your salvation.<WH3444>"

Let those who seek<WH1245> after my soul<WH5315> be disappointed<WH954> and brought to dishonor.<WH3637> Let those who plot<WH2803> my ruin<WH7451> be turned<WH5472> back<WH268> and confounded.<WH2659>
Let them be as chaff<WH4671> before<WH6440> the wind,<WH7307> Yahweh<WH3068>'s angel<WH4397> driving them on.<WH1760>
Let their way<WH1870> be dark<WH2822> and slippery,<WH2519> Yahweh<WH3068>'s angel<WH4397> pursuing them.<WH7291>
For without cause<WH2600> they have hidden<WH2934> their net<WH7568> in a pit<WH7845> for me.<WH2600> Without cause they have dug<WH2658> a pit for my soul.<WH5315>
Let destruction<WH7722> come<WH935> on him unawares.<WH3045> Let his net<WH7568> that he has hidden<WH2934> catch<WH3920> himself.<WH5307> Let him fall into that destruction.<WH7722>
My soul<WH5315> shall be joyful<WH1523> in Yahweh.<WH3068> It shall rejoice<WH7797> in his salvation.<WH3444>

All my bones<WH6106> shall say,<WH559> "Yahweh,<WH3068> who is like you,<WH5337> who delivers the poor<WH6041> from him who is too strong<WH2389> for him;<WH6041> yes, the poor and the needy<WH6041> from him who robs him?<WH1497>"
Unrighteous<WH2555> witnesses<WH5707> rise up.<WH6965> They ask me about things<WH7592> that I don't<WH3045> know about.
They reward<WH7999> me evil<WH7451> for good,<WH2896> to the bereaving<WH7908> of my soul.<WH5315>

But as for me,<WH2470> when they were sick, my clothing<WH3830> was sackcloth.<WH8242> I afflicted<WH6031> my soul<WH5315> with fasting.<WH6685> My prayer<WH8605> returned<WH7725> into my own bosom.<WH2436>
I behaved<WH1980> myself as though it had been my friend<WH7453> or my brother.<WH251> I bowed down<WH7817> mourning,<WH6937> as one who mourns<WH57> his mother.<WH517>

But in my adversity,<WH6761> they rejoiced,<WH8055> and gathered themselves together.<WH622> The attackers<WH5222> gathered themselves together<WH622> against me,<WH3045> and I didn't know it.<WH7167> They tore at me,<WH1826> and didn't cease.
Like the profane<WH2611> mockers<WH3934> in feasts,<WH4580> they gnashed<WH2786> their teeth at me.<WH8127>
Lord,<WH136> how long will you look on?<WH7200> Rescue<WH7725> my soul<WH5315> from their destruction,<WH7722> my precious<WH3173> life from the lions.<WH3715>
I will give you thanks<WH3034> in the great<WH7227> assembly.<WH6951> I will praise<WH1984> you among many<WH6099> people.<WH5971>
Don't<WH341> let those who are my enemies wrongfully<WH8267> rejoice<WH8055> over me;<WH8130> neither let those who hate me without a cause<WH2600> wink<WH7169> their eyes.<WH5869>
For they don't<WH1696> speak peace,<WH7965> but they devise<WH2803> deceitful<WH4820> words<WH1697> against those who are quiet<WH7282> in the land.<WH776>
Yes,<WH6310> they opened their mouth wide<WH7337> against me.<WH559> They said, "Aha!<WH1889> Aha!<WH1889> Our eye<WH5869> has seen it!<WH7200>"
You have seen<WH7200> it,<WH3068> Yahweh. Don't<WH2790> keep silent. Lord,<WH3068> don't<WH7368> be far from me.
Wake<WH6974> up!<WH5782> Rise up to defend<WH4941> me,<WH430> my God! My Lord,<WH136> contend for me!<WH7379>
Vindicate<WH8199> me,<WH3068> Yahweh my God,<WH430> according to your righteousness.<WH6664> Don't<WH8055> let them gloat over me.
Don't<WH559> let them say in their heart,<WH3820> "Aha!<WH1889> That<WH5315>'s the way we want it!" Don't<WH559> let them say, "We have swallowed him up!<WH1104>"

Let them be disappointed<WH954> and confounded<WH954> together<WH3162> who rejoice<WH8056> at my calamity.<WH7451> Let them be clothed<WH3847> with shame<WH1322> and dishonor<WH1322> who magnify themselves against me.<WH1431>

Let them shout for joy<WH7442> and be glad,<WH8055> who favor<WH2655> my righteous cause.<WH6664> Yes,<WH559> let them say continually,<WH8548> "Yahweh<WH3068> be magnified,<WH1431> who has pleasure<WH2655> in the prosperity<WH7965> of his servant!<WH5650>"
My tongue<WH3956> shall talk<WH1897> about your righteousness<WH6664> and about your praise<WH8416> all day long.<WH3117>
